member.name: T:C1.Web.Api.DataEngine.DataEngineController
member.summary: The data engine controller.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Api.DataEngine.DataEngineController.GetFields(System.String)
member.summary: Gets all the fields information defined in the data.
member.param: The data source key specifies the data.
member.returns: The field list and the total data count.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Api.DataEngine.DataEngineController.GetRawData(System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Gets the raw data.
member.param: The data source key specifies the data.
A number value which is used to exclude the first n entities. n is specified by this value
A number value which indicates the count of the data requested.
member.returns: The raw data and the total count of all the raw data.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Api.DataEngine.DataEngineController.AnalyzeData(System.String,C1.Web.Api.DataEngine.Models.EngineRequest)
member.summary: Analyzes the data.
member.param: The data source key specifies the data.
The engine request.
member.returns: The analysis result information.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Api.DataEngine.DataEngineController.GetDetail(System.String,C1.Web.Api.DataEngine.Models.DetailRequest)
member.summary: Gets a list of objects in the raw data source that define the content of a specific cell in the output table.
member.param: The data source key specifies the data.
The request for the cell detail raw data.
member.returns: The raw data which the cell includes and the total count of the cell raw data.
member.remarks: Now only the DataEngine data and the in-memory data support this action. The cube data doesn't support it.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Api.DataEngine.DataEngineController.GetUniqueValues(System.String,System.String,C1.Web.Api.DataEngine.Models.EngineRequest)
member.summary: Gets the unique values of a field.
member.param: The data source key specifies the data.
The key of the field which unique values you want to get.
The engine request.
member.returns: The unique value list.
member.remarks: Now only the DataEngine data and the in-memory data support this action. The cube data doesn't support it.

member.summary: Gets the analysis result data.
member.param: The data source key specifies the data.
The key specifies the analysis instance.
member.returns: The analysis result data.

member.summary: Gets the analysis status.

member.name: T:C1.Web.Api.DataEngine.Data.IFlexPivotEngineProvider
member.summary: The flex pivot engine provider interface.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Api.DataEngine.Data.IFlexPivotEngineProvider.GetUniqueValues(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object},System.String)
member.summary: Gets the unqiue values of the specified field.
member.param: View definition used for performing aggregation.
The name of the field to provide unique values for.
member.returns: Collection of objects with properties Name (string) and Type (System.Type)
member.remarks: The user should be aware that getting value list can take considerable time if number of rows in the source data is very large.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Api.DataEngine.Data.IFlexPivotEngineProvider.GetDetail(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object},System.Object[])
member.summary: Gets the source data rows used in obtaining a given aggregated value.
member.param: View definition used for performing aggregation.
Key values specifying the aggregated value (subtotal)./>
member.returns: List of source data objects that contributed to the given aggregation value.
member.remarks: It is recommended to use paging providing source data to the clients, because a DataEngine table can have a very large number of rows and aggregating a subtotal can involve a considerable part of all rows.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Api.DataEngine.Data.IFlexPivotEngineProvider.GetAggregatedData(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object},System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource,System.Action{System.Int32})
member.summary: Gets the aggregated results according to the given view in an asynchronous execution
member.param: View definition used for performing aggregation.
The cancellation token source.
A callback function to report analysis progress.
member.returns: View execution (aggregation) result

member.summary: Gets the field collection defined in the data source.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Api.DataEngine.Data.IFlexPivotEngineProvider.RawData
member.summary: Get the entire raw source data.

member.name: T:C1.Web.Api.DataEngine.Data.FlexPivotEngineProviderManager
member.summary: The aggregated data provider manager.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Api.DataEngine.Data.FlexPivotEngineProviderManager.AddCube(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a cube data.
member.param: The unique value used to stand for the data.
The connection string for the cube data.
Specify the cube name in the cube data.
member.returns: The flex pivot engine provider manager.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Api.DataEngine.Data.FlexPivotEngineProviderManager.AddDataEngine(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a DataEngine data which data files already exist.
member.param: The unique value used to stand for the data source.
Path in the server's file system where DataEngine data files locate.
The name of the DataEngine table.
member.returns: The flex pivot engine provider manager.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Api.DataEngine.Data.FlexPivotEngineProviderManager.AddDataEngine(System.String,System.Data.Common.DbCommand,System.Data.Common.DbConnection,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a DataEngine data from a database.
member.param: The unique value used to stand for the data source.
ADO.NET command object for retrieving data from the database. The connection in the command should be open.
An open ADO.NET connection object for connecting to the database.

Path in the server's file system where DataEngine data is saved in files. If it is set to null or not set, the default workspace is used. The default workspace path is "application base path + /Data". You can change it via the .SetDefaultWorkspacePath(string path) method.
The name of the DataEngine table. If it is set to null or not set, the value of the name parameter is used.
member.returns: The flex pivot engine provider manager.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Api.DataEngine.Data.FlexPivotEngineProviderManager.AddDataEngine``1(System.String,System.Func{System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0}},System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a DataEngine data from an arbitrary IEnumerable.
member.param: The unique value used to stand for the data source.
A function to get an arbitrary IEnumerable.

Path in the server's file system where DataEngine data is saved in files. If it is set to null or not set, the default workspace is used. The default workspace path is "application base path + /Data". You can change it via the .SetDefaultWorkspacePath(string path) method.
The name of the DataEngine table. If it is set to null or not set, the value of the name parameter is used.
member.returns: The flex pivot engine provider manager.

member.summary: Adds a DataSource data from an arbitrary IEnumerable.
member.param: The unique value used to stand for the data.
A function used to return the arbitrary IEnumerable.
member.returns: The flex pivot engine provider manager.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Api.DataEngine.Data.FlexPivotEngineProviderManager.AddDataSource(System.String,System.Collections.IEnumerable)
member.summary: Adds a DataSource data from an arbitrary IEnumerable.
member.param: The unique value used to stands for the data.
The arbitrary IEnumerable.
member.returns: The flex pivot engine provider manager.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Api.DataEngine.Data.FlexPivotEngineProviderManager.GetFieldsFromRDMeta(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Gets the fields from the meta of the DataEngine data and the DataSource data.
member.param: The meta data.
member.returns: A field collection.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Api.DataEngine.Data.FlexPivotEngineProviderManager.GetFieldsFromCubeMeta(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Gets the cube fields from the meta of the cube data.
member.param: The meta data.
member.returns: A field collection.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Api.DataEngine.Data.FlexPivotEngineProviderManager.DisposeWorkspace(System.String)
member.summary: Disposes the specified workspace and cancel all related tasks.
member.param: The path of the workspace to be disposed.
member.remarks: It only works when analyzing a DataEngine data. If the path is not set, the default workspace will be disposed. Please be careful and ensure you DO want to dispose the workspace when you will call this method. It will cancel all running tasks (if any exists) with the specified workspace and remove locks from files. So after calling this method, you will be able to delete them.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Api.DataEngine.Data.FlexPivotEngineProviderManager.SetDataEngineAnalysisResultMaxCount(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the max count of the analysis result data.
member.param: The max count.
member.remarks: When the count of the analysis result data exceeds maxCount, an exception would be thrown. When maxCount is not set, the count is not limited. Normally an integer which is not lower than zero can be set to maxCount. If a negative integer is set to maxCount, the count is not limited.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Api.DataEngine.Data.FlexPivotEngineProviderManager.SetDefaultWorkspacePath(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the default workspace path for the DataEngine data.
member.param: The path of the default workspace.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Api.DataEngine.Models.DetailRequest.Keys
member.summary: Gets or sets a array, which is used to specify some cell.
member.remarks: Firstly, you need add the values of the fields in rowFields in order into keys. Then add the values of the fields in columnFields in order. If some field value is null, JUST add null into array and DO NOT remove it. ou should keep the count of the keys array same as the count of the fields in rowFields and columnFields.
